projects.title: Exercise App
projects.description: Fitness application designed to help users track their workout goals.
projects.challenge: Troubleshooting the stopwatch functionality revealed the need for a dedicated function to ensure precise time formatting.

projects.title: Todo App
projects.description: A productivity tool designed to help users organize and manage their tasks effectively.
projects.challenge: Integrating user authentication, registration, and task tracking into one project proved challenging. Implementing a menu page was the most straightforward solution to demonstrate the project's functionality.

projects.title: Quiz App
projects.description: The Quiz app is a React Native application designed to provide users with a simple and interactive way to take quizzes.

projects.title: Flash Card App
projects.description: A flash card app for practicing vocabulary or concepts.

projects.title: Exercise Design
projects.description: Crafted in Figma, the Exercise Design embodies a modern and vibrant aesthetic, aimed at delivering an engaging fitness experience.

projects.title: Todo Design
projects.description: Developed in Figma, the Todo Design prioritizes simplicity and functionality.

projects.title: Mystical Realms
projects.description: A creative UI/UX project developed in Figma with a fantasy-inspired theme.

projects.title: Not Enough Salt
projects.description: A meal planning prototype designed in Figma to help users organize their dietary needs effectively.

projects.title: Labyrinth
projects.description: An interactive UI/UX project designed in Figma, focused on navigation experiences.
